text: “Ankeny is exactly the kind of suburb Democrats need to win to be successful in 2020,” said Iowa Dem vice chair Andrea Phillips, who lives in Ankeny. “In 2018, Democrat Heather Matson flipped House District 37 & Amber Gustafson came within 3% of GOP incumbent Jack Whitver.”
author: jameshohmann

text: Edward Douglas of Chicago was sentenced to life in prison in 2003 for selling 140 grams of crack cocaine. He is one of more than 2,000 prisoners now eligible for release under the First Step Act. He will be @CoryBooker’s #SOTU guest tonight.
author: jameshohmann

text: Trump tonight will announce a campaign to halt transmission of HIV in the USA by 2030. What's great is experts think this is something we can actually do as a country. It's within reach! HHS to roll out a detailed plan in coming days. https://www.washingtonpost.com/national/health-science/trump-planning-campaign-to-halt-transmission-of-hiv-in-us-by-2030/2019/02/04/f51c780c-28a1-11e9-b2fc-721718903bfc_story.html?utm_term=.1b74bfb6004b … #SOTU #SquadGoals

text: Rep. Eric Swalwell (D-Calif.), who has been traveling to the early states as he mulls a long-shot bid for the Democratic nomination, is highlighting his support for gun control by bringing a survivor of last February’s shooting at a high school in Parkland, Fla.
author: jameshohmann

text: Sen. Sherrod Brown (D-Ohio) is bringing Rita Lewis for the 2nd year in a row. Rita’s husband Butch, who passed away in 2015, was a Vietnam veteran, truck driver and a member of the Teamsters who became an activist to preserve underfunded pension plans. She’s continued his work.
author: jameshohmann

text: Sen. Kamala Harris (D-Calif.) found an air traffic controller who got furloughed during the shutdown after losing her home in a wildfire. The threat of flooding and mudslides — which have gotten worse because of climate change — then forced her to flee the property she rented.
author: jameshohmann

text: Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-Mass.) is bringing Sajid Shahriar, a Boston-based employee of the Department of Housing and Urban Development who was furloughed during the shutdown.
author: jameshohmann
